meanings.definition: A person who calculates or computes.
meanings.sent1: The figurer helped me solve the math problem.
meanings.sent2: The talented figurer quickly added up the numbers in his head.
meanings.sent3: The figurer's brain was like a calculator, always working efficiently.
meanings.sent4: She was a human figurer, always crunching numbers in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The figurer's expertise in math made him a valuable asset to the team.

meanings.definition: A symbol or design used to represent a number or quantity.
meanings.sent1: The ancient civilization used unique figures to represent their counting system.
meanings.sent2: The figure on the board represented the total amount of money raised.
meanings.sent3: The figure on the page seemed to dance around, making math more fun.
meanings.sent4: The figure of a heart symbolized love and affection.
meanings.sent5: The figure of a dollar sign indicated the cost of the item.

meanings.definition: To be significant or important in a particular situation.
meanings.sent1: Her opinion will figurer prominently in the decision-making process.
meanings.sent2: The safety of the passengers will figurer greatly in our planning.
meanings.sent3: His absence will figurer as a mystery in the investigation.
meanings.sent4: The role of teamwork will figurer as crucial in achieving success.
meanings.sent5: The weather will figurer heavily in our outdoor event planning.
